entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
